title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7001.2 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7001.2 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) This Part provides procedures by
which records may be obtained. (b) Personnel shall furnish to the
public information and records as defined in section
7001.1
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7001.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
